Website Pricing Calulator

Have you ever asked yourself how much a website should cost? Well here I've compiled a few questions to help you guage how much a website should cost based on research.

How many pages is your website going to need? If you don't just estimate. Pages can range from the homepage all the way to custom landing pages.

  • 1 - 9
  • 10 - 19
  • +20

Will your website be requiring a content managment system like WordPress or Drupal?

  • No
  • Yes

What level of design are you looking to achieve with your websites design. Basic, Template, Custom.


  • Basic
  • Templates

Is your website going to need customized repsonsive design? Or are you just going to want minimal responsive features.


  • Simple
  • Comprehensive

Total:
